channel.title: Quick question
channel.description:
ok when i attack with my godsword my guy punches how can i change this i think it has to do with attack style or somthing.. can some 1 tell me what to edit like where would i add the ids to fix this =p
i kinda suck with servers now lol

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @Moparsuck Moparsuck
item.description:
@Moparsuck wrote:

Find this code in client.java:

public int GetWepAnim()

you should see some code then:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ****) //wep id
{
return ****; // we anim
}
